sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ArchiveUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ArchiveUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ArchiveUtil = Class.create();
ArchiveUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    isArchive: function(current) {
        return GlideArchiveTable.isArchive(current.getTableName());
    },

    hasArchive: function(current) {
        return GlideArchiveTable.hasArchive(current.getTableName());
    },

    hasBeenArchived: function(current) {
        if (!this.hasArchive(current))
            return false;

        var archiveLog = new GlideRecord('sys_archive_log');
        archiveLog.addQuery('id', current.sys_id);
		archiveLog.setLimit(1);
        archiveLog.query();
        return archiveLog.hasNext();
    },

    canArchive: function(current) {
        return this.hasBeenArchived(current) && GlideArchiveTable.hasArchiveRule(current.getTableName());
    },

    notRestored: function(current) {
        var archiveLog = new GlideRecord('sys_archive_log');
        archiveLog.addQuery('id', current.sys_id);
        archiveLog.addNullQuery('restored');
		archiveLog.setLimit(1);
        archiveLog.query();
        return archiveLog.next();
    },

    type: 'ArchiveUtil'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>don goodliffe</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2012-04-02 17:22:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>153c0d139f0120007aaa207c7f4bccbe</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ArchiveUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Data Archiving" source="com.glide.auxdb">e9b670a43cb1311068bcf327dfe37f91</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_153c0d139f0120007aaa207c7f4bccbe</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-26 20:46:28</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
